bike.description: D-6 High Modulus Carbon monocoque, integrated oversized 1.5 lower head tube, IST (Integrated Seat Tube), water bottle mount. Rear triangle: D-6 High Modulus Carbon, w/A4BL(Advanced 4 Bar Linkage) system 100mm travel, Cold forged dropout with CNC D disc mount and replaceable hanger, Sealed bearing pivots

ROCKSHOX SID RLT Ti w/Tapered Head Tube, 100mm Travel, w/ PopLoc Remote LockOut
FSA K-Force Light Compact 386 MegaExo w/Integrated spindle, 27/42T
Shimano XTR 980 GS Shadow Top normal 10sp
Shimano XTR 985-XCRace Centerlock Clincher Wheelset, 24H Tubeless
Oval M-800 15mm Sweep Carbon Riser Bar, 31.8mm
